entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:28 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
